meaningMnemonic: You're standing under a <radical>canopy</radical> when you see something strange sticking out of the <radical>dirt</radical>. You pull it, but it won't budge. You pull harder and harder until the dirt starts rumbling and a giant <kanji>manor</kanji> starts rising out of the ground with you on top!
readingMnemonic: The beautiful <kanji>manor</kanji> begins to shake and the <reading>shou</reading>gun (しょう) bursts out of the front door. "WHO HAS UNEARTHED MY SECRET MANOR?!" he screams.
